conversations: [{"from": "human", "value": "What is the difference between LimeSurvey and LimeSurvey GmbH?"}, {"from": "gpt", "value": "LimeSurvey refers to the software itself, which is an open-source, web server-based application distributed under the GNU General Public License (GPL v2) and above. [{"from": "human", "value": "What are the licensing terms for LimeSurvey?"}, {"from": "gpt", "value": "LimeSurvey is distributed under the General Public License (GPL v2), which allows users to use, modify, and distribute the software for commercial, private, and educational purposes. [{"from": "human", "value": "What are the main differences between LimeSurvey Cloud and LimeSurvey CE?"}, {"from": "gpt", "value": "LimeSurvey Cloud is a hosted service provided by LimeSurvey, allowing quick setup with no installation required, whereas LimeSurvey CE is a self-hosted option that you install on your own server.
